main.name: Brandon Brown
main.description: I'm passionate about web design, music and gaming. I welcome teamwork and am open to collaborating with other developers on projects. Please feel free to contact me about any project collaborations or job opportunities
main.bio: I was introduced to coding through college and I've been intrigued ever since. I worked in retail as a Visual Merchandiser before being accepted into the Pursuit Fellowship program and becoming a coder. There I was able to work alongside like minded individuals whom shared one single goal, to secure their first job as a developer. I hope to combine my love for fashion, music, and coding to deliver a frictionless user experience.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to me for any opportunities!

resume.skillmessage: Here are technologies that I know and use to build projects

education.description: Enrolled in an intensive 1 year, Google-funded software engineering fellowship with a 9% acceptance rate .

work.title: Studio Assistant
work.description:
• Assisted in shipping and receiving unloading trucks and checking in merchandise.
• Sorted and placed materials or items on racks, shelves or in bins according to organizational standards. • Maintained a safe and clean work environment by keeping shelves and work stations neat.

work.title: Visual Merchandiser
work.description: Recommend, selected, and helped locate or obtain merchandise based on customer needs and desires. Answered customer's questions, and provided information on procedures or policies. Assisted with duties in other areas of the store, such as monitoring fitting rooms, or handled cash and credit transactions. Trained more than 10+ newly hired associates. Set up displays of merchandise on walls, collets, or tables to attract customers and promote sales.

projects.title: Tinni
projects.category: A website to seamlessly craft and save an itinerary

projects.title: Flashbook
projects.category: A remake of the well known social media website, Facebook.

projects.title: Soothe
projects.category: A website that displays the weather and an alarm feature, providing users a soother way to start their mornings.
